transitionOperatorSets.name: AND Transition Expression Operator
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff all suboperations return true.

transitionOperatorSets.name: Cell Process In Step Operator
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated APM instance is in the indicated process step.

transitionOperatorSets.name: NOT Transition Expression Operator
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the suboperator returns false (i.e. it logically complements or inverts whatever operator it's applied to).

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Array Length Equal to Value
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the length of the array stored at OCD path equals the specified numerical value (direct or indirect).

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Boolean Flag Is Set
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated Boolean flag namespace is true.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Compare Values
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff operand A and B values compare using the indicated comparison operator.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Namespace Is Greater Than Value
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated OCD namespace is greater than the indicated value. Limited to number and string value comparisons only.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Namespace Is Identical To Value
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated OCD namespace is identical (i.e. strictly equal (===)) to the indicated value. Limited to number and string value comparisons only.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Namespace Is Less Than Value
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated OCD namespace is less than the indicated value. Limited to number and string value comparisons only.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OCD Namespace Is Truthy
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff the indicated OCD namespace is truthy.

transitionOperatorSets.name: OR Transition Expression Operator
transitionOperatorSets.description: Returns Boolean true iff any suboperations return true.

filterDescriptor.operationDescription: Retrieves a reference to the subfilter that should be used to process this request.
OPC-intrinsic performs no operation (noop). When invoked via OPC.act, the effect is to perform no read/write operations on OPC-instanced shared memory. And, then perform an evaluation.
